attributes.additional_details:
Motorists are being used as cash cows. The last massive increase in road tax seems to have been forgotten along with the massive increase in petrol prices.

And what do we the motorists see for our massive taxes? Some of the worst roads in Europe, pot holes and very poor cheap repairs. Some car makers are developing new testing grounds for UK cars due to such poor roads!

Motorists want road tax to be invested in roads and not used to solve all the government funding issues.

Introducing road tolls is in fact just a stealth increase in road tax for motorists.

David Cameron "I want to give the motorist a fair deal"?

It is simply not acceptable to further increase motoring costs.

STOP this now and give us a fair deal!
